message.name: ERR_PRODUCTTIMECON_RECORDALREADYCANCELLED
message.locale: This product time constraint has been canceled already.
This product time constraint has been cancelled already.

message.name: ERR_PRODUCTTIMECON_NUMDAYSNOTENTERED
message.locale: Number of days must be entered.

message.name: ERR_PRODUCTTIMECON_PRODTIMECONTYPENOTENTERED
message.locale: Product time constraint type must be entered.

message.name: ERR_PRODUCTTIMECON_FROMDATELATERTHANTODAY
message.locale: From date must not be later than today.

message.name: ERR_PRODUCTTIMECON_FROMDATEEARLIERTHANTODAY
message.locale: From date must not be earlier than today.

message.name: ERR_PRODUCTTIMECON_OVERLAPTIMECONSTRAINT
message.locale: A time constraint type must not overlap with an existing time constraint of the same type.
